item.title: What bow strings are made of
item.summary: A note on what bow strings are made of. Lloyd notes that she cannot be sure if these are for shooting or playing. Different sinews are listed.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book II-36
item.storypages: not numbered, an insert in Book A2_1_24

keyword.subkw: used in making bow strings and musical instruments
